wikipedia_page.main: Captain Barry Nugent Yelverton, 5th Viscount Avonmore (11 February 1859 – 13 February 1885) was an Anglo-Irish peer and an officer in the 37th Foot, which was renamed as the Hampshire Regiment in 1881.

response: *13 February – Barry Yelverton, 5th Viscount Avonmore, nobleman and officer (born 1859).
*11 February – Barry Yelverton, 5th Viscount Avonmore, nobleman and officer (died 1885).
* Barry Yelverton, 5th Viscount Avonmore (1859–1885), Anglo-Irish peer and army officer
